metadata.name: Destruction in the Heart of the Forest
metadata.description:
I was flying over a dense forest of conifers and noticed a section of downed trees. As I approached it, the shape that formed began to resemble a heart. The mental association with this was greatly aided by the vibrant red in the trunks of the trees, which contrasted with the dark green of the surroundings standing trees. 

I feel this piece is the perfect launch to the Communitree series as it incorporates many of the symbols that this collective series(paired with Singularitrees) embodies.
